 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַח‎</span> **adjective** ==moist, fresh, new==; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Gen.30.37|Gen 30:37]]; [[Ezek.21.3|Ezek 21:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָ֑ח‎</span>[[Ezek.17.24|Ezek 17:24]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַחִים‎</span> [[Num.6.3|Num 6:3]] + 2 t.; — 

**1.** ***moist, fresh***, of trees, fruit, etc.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִבְנֶה לַח‎</span> [[Gen.30.37|Gen 30:37]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵץ ל‎</span> [[Ezek.17.24|Ezek 17:24]]; [[Ezek.21.3|Ezek 21:3]] grapes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲנָבִים ל‎</span> [[Num.6.3|Num 6:3]]. 

**2.** ***new***, of cords, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְתָרִים ל‎</span> [[Judg.16.7|Judg 16:7]]; [[Judg.16.8|Judg 16:8]], probably made of ***fresh*** sinews of animal (compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>1652</sup>; [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]<sup>on the passage</sup>)
